- The Fall of Rome
- The Norman Conquest
- The Black Death
- The Civil War

html: There are so many times you can exclaim “fuck me, it’s hot” without maddening yourself and everyone around you. I passed that point too long ago to care. Thus: fuck me, it’s hot.
